dc:title: On Pilgrimage - March 1960
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Describes her travel tips on a journey to Chicago. Visits her childhood street and reminisces on their poverty, learning to pray, and her vocation to poverty. Tells of a picket line in support of a tax resister and defends their use of the name Catholic.
